description: I attended junior high school 1 bergas, where I built a strong academic foundation and developed my early interest in science and technology.

I took my vocational high school education at SMK Negeri 2 Salatiga, majoring in Industrial Electronic Engineering. During my vocational high school years, I deepened my studies such as Cx-One (PLC), Arduino Ide, Proteus, PCB Making while also actively participating in extracurricular activities

Currently, I am studying Electrical Engineering at State Polytechnic of Semarang. This program has allowed me to explore various aspects of electronics, programming, and engineering design, preparing me for a career in the tech and innovation industry
